meanings.sent1: She conned her friend into believing a fake story.
meanings.sent2: The scam artist conned innocent people out of their money.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox conned the other animals into giving him extra food.

meanings.sent5: He conned his way through the tricky maze of lies.
